Dragon, Copper

12 HP, 2 Armor, 16 STR, 14 DEX, 18 WIL, bite (d8+d8)

Summary:

• Good aligned dragons that dwell in dry, rocky regions.

• Appreciate jokes and riddles, frequently prank passing travelers.

• Cannot be charmed and put to sleep.
